title: 13 Reasons Why
synopsis: After a teenage girl's perplexing suicide, a classmate receives a series of tapes that unravel the mystery of her tragic choice.
cast: Katherine Langford, Dylan Minnette, Brandon Flynn

episodes.title: Tape 1, Side A
episodes.synopsis: As the school mourns the death of Hannah Baker, her friend Clay receives a box of tapes with messages she recorded before she committed suicide.

episodes.title: Tape 1, Side B
episodes.synopsis: Hannah makes friends with Jessica and Alex, two other new students. Justin doesn't show up at school, and Hannah's mother finds something troubling.

episodes.title: Tape 2, Side A
episodes.synopsis: Jealousy and gossip take a toll on Hannah's relationships. As Alex struggles with feelings of regret, the guys pressure Clay into getting drunk.

episodes.title: Tape 2, Side B
episodes.synopsis: Hannah thinks someone is stalking her and sets a trap. Hannah's mother confronts the principal, and Clay strikes back at someone who wronged Hannah.

episodes.title: Tape 3, Side A
episodes.synopsis: Hannah and Clay connect at the school dance, but a crass rumor ruins the mood. Clay takes Courtney to visit Hannah's grave.

episodes.title: Tape 3, Side B
episodes.synopsis: Hannah's date on Valentine's Day doesn't go as planned. Alex gets in a big fight at school and has to face the honor board.

episodes.title: Tape 4, Side A
episodes.synopsis: Another student sabotages Hannah during a class project. Clay's nightmares about Hannah spill over into the daytime.

episodes.title: Tape 4, Side B
episodes.synopsis: Inspired by a friendâ€™s poetry reading, Hannah pours her heart out. Tony confides in Clay about the night of Hannah's death.

episodes.title: Tape 5, Side A
episodes.synopsis: Hannah witnesses a traumatic event at a summertime party. Clay tries to reason with Justin, and Marcus warns him that the worst is yet to come.

episodes.title: Tape 5, Side B
episodes.synopsis: A distraught Hannah gets a ride home from the party. Jessica's behavior grows increasingly erratic, and Clay learns the truth behind a tragedy.

episodes.title: Tape 6, Side A
episodes.synopsis: Clay and Hannah grow closer. While Clay spends a heartbreaking night listening to his tape with Tony, tensions boil over at Bryce's house.

episodes.title: Tape 6, Side B
episodes.synopsis: Hannah winds up at a party after an argument with her parents. The students are served with subpoenas, and Justin wrestles with conflicting loyalties.

episodes.title: Tape 7, Side A
episodes.synopsis: Hannah seeks help from Mr. Porter, the school counselor. Clay plays the new tape for Tony and weighs what to do next.
